Nature holds a balance between diverse ecosystems for smooth functioning. It consists of air, water, plants, animals, human life, and many more. Nature provides us with water to drink, air to breathe, food to eat, clothes to wear, and a shelter to live in. Imbalance in nature can be life-threatening to all.

Nature is the ultimate source of our living. Both living and non-living things include nature, and everyone is interdependent, which helps maintain the ecosystem. Plants, animals, and humans all depend on nature for their survival. It supplies oxygen, sunlight, soil, water, and other necessary components.

Nature provides us air to breathe, water to drink, soil to make a home and the land to stay. It gives us fruits, vegetables and grains to eat. Nature is a precious gift given to us by God. Hence, we should enjoy nature without disturbing its balance.
